entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:57 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
